official_title: A bill to require the exchange of properties in the area of Clarkston, Washington, between the United States and the Port of Whitman County, Washington.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to exchange specified lands with the Port of Whitman County, Washington, to acquire lands suitable for wildlife mitigation purposes.

titles.title: A bill to require the exchange of properties in the area of Clarkston, Washington, between the United States and the Port of Whitman County, Washington.
